summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Redis and Celery integration for Survey360 - all core features working properly
passed_tests: Redis server is running and accepting connections on port 6379
Templates are cached in Redis after first request (6 templates cached)
Celery worker is running with 2 concurrency and all 4 tasks registered
Celery beat scheduler is running for periodic tasks
All Survey360 endpoints work properly with Redis caching enabled
Cache performance optimization confirmed (second requests faster)
Connection pool monitoring active (812 available connections)
Background job system accessible and configured
success_percentage: backend: 100% (15/15 tests passed), redis: 100% (6/6 tests passed), celery: 100% (4/4 services running)
